name: Farming
description: Farms are used to acquire various resources efficiently. $(br)$(li)$(n)Manual farms$() rely mostly or solely on the $(l:creatures/human-player)$(thing)Player$() to harvest and restart the farm. $(br)$(li)$(n)Semi-automatic farms$() use mechanisms to automatically harvest the farm, but they are manually activated by the $(l:creatures/human-player)$(thing)Player$(). $(br)$(li)$(n)Fully automatic farms$() do not rely on the $(l:creatures/human-player)$(thing)Player$() at all and usually use $(l:creatures)$(thing)Mobs$() or more complicated mechanisms.
